posts.post_content:
Time to let him go after upgrading him. Green Cobb Piedmont 150 in an SGC 20 holder.

Asking $SOLD for him. Will consider trades or partial trades and cash if that helps. Just shoot me a PM.

Thanks for looking!
Jeff
